content.detailedDescription: I was driving along the charles river on the cambridge side heading towards north cambridge with a friend when i saw out the corner of my eye a flash of white light when i looked to my left i saw a star like object with a tail swoop down into the atmosphere fly up alittle and pit stop in mid air over boston........ i looked at my friend and askd 1 question "did u just see that?" he startd goin crazy saying "oh my god yes i did". i had told him in june of this year that i had a dream of me and him seeing a ufo and i told him "you will see 1 with me before the year was over", him not beliveing in that kind of stuff before 2days ago said" i dont think so, what are the odds of that happining"... he surly swollowd those words lol...
content.summary: Similar to elpaso event oct 16 2010

content.detailedDescription:
I was traveling south in i-270 near i-44 in kirkwood when i noticed a very bright star very slowly moving in the sky, apparently south of i-44 but paralleling eastbound. i exchanged to i-44 east and traveled about a mile passing by hills obscuring my vision south were the bright "star" was. when i got to a clearing i didn't see the star but saw an incongruent triangle of lights, two read and one white, all steady and not flashing. i came to another set of small hills obscuring those lights and looked for the lights where i expected them to be in the next clearing. i didn't see them but leaned forward and looked up, and just starting to cross the highway was a clearly equilateral triangle of white lights with a red light in the center. all the lights were steady but also flashed, the white lights one by one in a counter-clockwise direction. after it passed the highway going south to north, my right to left, one by one it turned off two of its white lights and then its center red light, but turned on a small red light next to the remaining single white light when the center red light went out. after it flew like that for a moment, it turned those lights back on in reverse order of how they shut off. it finally added two additional outer white lights as it flew off into the distance and i lost sight of it.

though not directly of this circumstance, i have recently had at least 4 other sightings of unidentified aerial phenomenon - unconventional lights and/or craft - at essentially this same location, september 29th, october 5th, and 14th. all these circumstances have involved seeing a star like object within a mile of the i-270/i-44 interchange, and subsequently seeing lights or an object or objects that are clearly unconventional shortly afterward. this time, ironically, the car radio song playing when i last saw the uap was singing "we should meet out space brothers of different races!" that's to corny to make up, i'm serious!!
content.summary: Triangle of lights one by one turn off then back after crossing i-44 near st. louis

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking pictures of the full moon, at approx 8:20 p.M. sunday nov 21st 2010. after downloading the pics into my computer, i noticed the circle's in the one picture, out of about 13. my condo is in the flight path of sanford airport, which would be to right of the circle. could it be from the flash of the camera? it is hard to tell, but after re-examination of the area, there were lights off the pool, but not that high in the sky. if you notice the moon shot, there is a faint circle, below the moon about the same diameter.

it is an unusual pic, and maybe you have access to equipment, that could determine what the object is.
content.summary: Taking pictures of the moon and object appeared when downloading.

content.detailedDescription:
Ufo incident, 11/18/10, winfield, ks, approx. 8 to 8:15p.M.

had gone outside to check the night sky in an effort to perhaps catch a few meteors of the leonids meteor shower.  had stood myself in a good dark area on the patio so as to have a better view of the sky while enjoying a fresh cup of hot coffee.  i was facing due west and had a clear sky, no clouds of any type and an almost full moon, 93% waxing gibbous, directly behind me in the eastern sky.  

i was leisurely scanning the dark night sky in hopes of seeing a few meteors as well as enjoying the view of vega and several other prominent stars and constellations.  cygnus looked very good as well as deneb and albireo.  i swung my eyes to the north and happened to notice something that at first looked very out of place.  but the longer i looked at it i focused more closely and realized i had something in sight that most certainly was not anything within what we could classify as the ���norm���.    

on first initial sighting it registered as a small light plane such as a cessna but then i noticed that the light configuration and brightness did not fit.  even more so, there were a total of five round lights, reddish orange in color yet rather dim in intensity.  insofar as size they were all the same size and appeared to me as being about half as large as the star sirius yet only one third to one fourth as bright. all individual lights were in a direct n-s line with each other, as well as evenly spaced from front to rear and moving at a very steady pace due south.

i estimated, by sight only, that they were at approximately between three and five thousand feet altitude.  the rate of movement from initially noticing them until they were out of sight remained the same and could be liberally estimated to perhaps be at or about three to four hundred miles per hour.  

from first sighting of these until they were out of sight there was absolutely no sound of any possible propulsion system whatsoever.   no standard aircraft position lights (red/green), flashing anti-collision lights or strobes were visible either.  there was but a steady, faint/dim brightness that never changed from beginning to end. they did seem to have a touch more of an intense red point towards the center but only enough to barely notice. 

as they moved steadily closer the second and third light began to separate from the main line upwards somewhat and then those two flipped further out to the side above the rest, spun around in what looked like a quick figure eight movement and then immediately came back in.  this action took place when they were directly in front of me.  only once they began to remerge into the line of the other lights all of them quickly transferred their flight formation into a very pronounce ���v���. by now they were to my left, due south, and had never slowed down.  shortly after forming into a ���v��� they then spread out into a straight line, east to west, but continued on south without any appearance of hesitation for those maneuvers whatsoever!  without question there are no aircraft that we are aware of that could make movements such as what i���ve described without obvious delays in their forward movement.  no change in forward movement occured whatsoever!!  even the blue angels or the thunderbirds cannot in any way shape or form make the same maneuvers as what these did as they continued in a very defined forward motion.  

i had but only two or three seconds before they disappeared behind the trees.  i ran out into the street to see if by chance i could follow them more but no luck.  needless to say it was both surprising and very intriguing.  simply put, just what were the lights that i had just seen and were they experimental aircraft or the obvious other? there is no way of ever knowing for sure.  but i must say one thing ��� it was one of the most invigorating experiences i���ve ever had.  there is more in the sky than stars!
content.summary: Five reddish orange dim/faint lights, round in shape fly over and make unusual maneuvers.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in tucson on the east side at catalina mart on golf links rd & pantano waiting for my friend who went inside when i noticed a line of lights coming up over the city skyline towards my direction. i am an avid ufo hunter as it is so, naturally, i had my camera with me and began filming. it was a line of red/orange fireball orbs. my friend and i as well as a couple other random spectators gawked as they flew overhead. i considered they might be chinese lanterns until i zoomed in on one of them.

they floated over us and disappeared. before they dissipated, i was able to zoom in on one that was right over us at about 300 ft. above our heads, it was a red fireball and it was rotating like a little red light house or something! there was no form to these lights other than that they themselves appeared to be made of light. unlike the previous report from the same night, i did not see them flash. they all seemed to simply vanish into the night sky rather than get further away in distance. they disappeared. thank god i had my camera! my channel on (link moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg) please check it out and add me.... i see ufos all of the time but i don't want to 'cry wolf' but given the fact that there were multiple, unassociated witnesses in this case, i felt it would be appropriate for me to give my account of what happened and share the video. thank you. 

p.S. i hope they dont delete this link to the video as i cannot upload directly to the mufon site for some reason. my youtube again is **link moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg) plus someone else who i do not know personally but who also lives here in tucson took video the same night half an hour earlier on a different side of town and that ***(link moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg).
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.shape: Boomerang,   Circle,   Fireball,   Sphere,   Teardrop,   Triangle,   Other
content.summary: I can confirm the tucson sighting seen by many + video

content.detailedDescription:
The attached images were taken during a camping trip on lake mead in march of 2010. the original photos were taken because of the unusual cloud formations which came up very quickly over the lake. i did not see or hear anything in the sky while taking the original photos. while reviewing the photos recently, i noticed these small shapes. i did try to enhance and enlarge the shapes seen in the series (approximately 7) of photos on photoshop (all of which had images of the small shapes). i am submitting several of the original photos plus some of the enhanced ones. i would like to see if i can find out what the images are.

thank you
content.summary: Only noticed these images after photoshop enhancment of original photos taken.

content.detailedDescription: Was out in my backyard late in the night. looking up at the clear sky. i saw a con-trail. i then looked to see what was making the trail and saw a object moving through the sky. at first i thought it was a plane but looking the strobeing was too fast and bright. and it was moving too fast in a west to east direction. i then looked for jet airliners that fly in the area to compare it to, none where around. will be out with a camera at night from now on. defiantly not a plane, commercial or military that i saw.
content.summary: Very fast strobing fast moving

content.detailedDescription: For about the last 2 weeks my normally quiet and relaxed dog has been acting quite wierd. he has been given the nickname bipolar puppy. he used to be ok in the dark he would sleep all night and only get up to potty. but now he cries and barks and carries on like something is hurting him. the only way i can get any sleep is to be right in front of him. on november 20th at 509 am i decided to take him for a walk to try to calm him down.  we got to the end of my yard and i felt "look up" and i saw 5 triangular objects flying in a straight line. they flew that way for about 2 minutes then the last one broke the pattern and went directly under the last one. im not sure if at that point they went out of my line of sight or just disappeared, but i thought wait, come back, and they reappearedright where i saw them the first time. hearing the voice in my head didnt even begin to frighten me, but having them reappear after i thought it, scared the living daylights out of me. i nearly strangled jake trying to get back in the house.  they probably think that i am rude after all that, but maybe they'll understand.  the other wierd thing is that almost immediately after getting back in the house jake went and layed down and fell asleep ans stayed asleep for the rest of the morning. he even slept all last night. it was wonderful.
content.summary: 5 trangle ufos over house

content.detailedDescription:
I am an amateur astronomer. i was studying physics for three years and a half and i know the southern sky, where i live.
that was my only sighting in my life and i never talked about it with anyone.
i would like to report this sighting, because i found your site seriously.

i was watching the sky with my small telescope with a 100-fold increase.
that night they were visible to the west, mars, jupiter and the moon (half moon).

at approximately 11 hours pm a little below the moon, a red object appeared, almost as bright as mars.
i quickly pointed my telescope at the object and was amazed at what i saw. a huge hexagonal object with a jet red below it.
the object was black, but you could see your way, because it was illuminated by sunlight.
your speed was relatively slow and i could perfectly accompany him using the levers of the telescope.
after a few minutes following the object, it has exactly opposite the moon, which gave me a reference to then calculate its size.
follow the object for about one hour, and from a certain point i no longer needed to move the telescope. at that point i was looking at the object underneath. that was approximately in the region of formalhaut.

the jet of energy emitted by this object was very different from anything i've ever seen in my life. it looked like a mix of "flaring" with laser light.

on the following monday i called the astronomical observatory of campinas, and did not give me much attention. they asked me to describe the sighting eto in the end i say, "what you saw was a weather balloon."
honestly, i know a balloon. do not release balloons burst of energy, not hexagonal and not fly out of the atmosphere (so that the object was illuminated by sunlight).

i then calculate the size of the object with the data i had on hand, i could calculate the minimum size of this object, and was surprised to reach the size of 17km (11 miles) from side to side.

i would like you to get in touch with me and guide me on how best to publicize this sighting.

much appreciated,

*(wit's first name deleted--cms/sg).

On the approximate date and time my wife and i were star-gazing in our front yard on a nearly clear sky. i observed an intense and very brief flash of white light in the shape of a dot. it startled me a bit because we had seen no planes or fo in that vicinity. there was no context whatever, just an intense dot that had no shafts of light radiating from it. i watched that area for another minute hoping to see it again, which i did in a slightly different position, but identical other than that.  i told my wife who was standing several feet away. i watched for several minutes more without seeing it again. i had just stopped looking and was about to suggest that we go inside, when my wife said, "i just saw it". we watched a short while longer without seeing it again and went indoors. niether of us had any idea what it was. the unusual aspects of the sighting were that neither of us had ever seen anything like it before despite our history of sky-watching. i have previously reported other sightings to mufon. the quality of the light itself was also unique, it appeared niether incandescent, flourescent nor any other type i am familiar with. as i said, there were no rays of light radiating from it, yet it was intensely bright and seemed somehow focused. the interval of appearances was unusual, a minute or so apart and irregular and they stayed within a small area of the sky as if it were loitering. there was no audible sound. it was just a small dot of chalk-white light that blinked on and off three times in about five minutes in an area where it should not be.
content.summary: Unusual flashes of light in sky

content.detailedDescription: Was leaving out of the chevron refinery where i work i looked up into the sky and seen the object . it wasn't very high in the sky . was lower then the cloud cover.  i thought i was crazy at first , had one passenger with me got his attention he couldn't idetify at either. as we continued driving to our office we could see it slowly climb higher into the sky. we watched it for a few more minutes until it dissappered over the horizon to the west. my best description would be that it looked like a comet flying horizontally.
content.summary: Large glowing orange teardrop  was also described as looking like an orange sperm,

content.detailedDescription: My wife, brother, and father were returning from st. augustine about 7:19 p.M. saturday, november 20, 2010. when i got out of the car, there were a number of bright red fireballs in the western sky towards middleburg, florida. we live between green cove springs and middleburg. the fireballs seemed to line up, then disappear one by one and reappear. i ran into the house and got my camcorder and my wife called the sheriff's office at the same time. a number of them would appear as if coming from the ground moving straight up as one would disappear. four of the fireballs formed a curved line, then slowly moved away from each other and disappeared. i took my camcorder back into the house when they disappeared. my brother yelled for me to come back outside and the lights had re-appeared and formed a perfect triangle moving south in the night sky. i had left my camcorder in the house so i didn't get video of the triangle. i, also, sent an email to channel 4.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright red lights in the sky first in a line, then arc, then forming a triangle and disappearing

content.detailedDescription: I've been working the night shift as a cab driver for several years, and i'm an avid skywatcher, and a ufo "enthusiast", if you will. i'm constantly keeping my eyes on the skies, but up until now i've never seen anything that i couldn't explain(as much as i have wanted to see something). on saturday, november 20th at 7:22pm i was driving in the city of roseville michigan, going eastbound on 10 mile road, when i saw this strange light directly ahead of me, at what appeared to be maybe 200 to 300 feet in the air. at first i thought it might have been a firework(a roman candle) that someone had just shot off. but the light remained constant and didn't dim or go out, which is when i said to myself "what the heck is that?". i immediately pulled over onto a side steet and got out of the car to get a good look at it. at this point it was almost directly above me, and now looked to be perhaps 500 feet in the air. although it's hard to judge distance on a "light". there was no structure that i could make out, just a light. an orange-ish pink-ish hue, a color unlike any other light i have ever seen in the sky, and although not extremely bright, it appeared to have sort of brilliant corona, as if it should have been bright, but the intensity of the light just was not bright. kind of difficult to explain really. as i watched it fly past, it "appeared" to be moving at a relatively slow to moderate speed, steadily gaining altitude, and heading on a true and straight line trajectory. i would say it was climbing at a 45 degree angle. even though the speed appeared to be constant(slow to moderate) it didn't take long(about 90 seconds?) for the object to fade away into the distance, at which point i would guess it to be several thousand feet by then. like i said, it's hard to gauge distance on a light, and it was also small in size. if my estimate of it's height when i got out of the car to look at it is correct(500 feet), then i would guess it's size to be 6 feet in diameter. the light never varied in intensity, it didn't flicker, and it didn't change color. i don't know what this was, but i can tell you what it wasn't. it wasn't a chinese lantern. it wasn't a balloon. it wasn't a flare tied to a balloon. it wasn't any sort of radio controlled craft. and it definitely wasn't any type of conventional aircraft. it was simply a "light". close enough for me to see that it wasn't "attached" to any sort of craft, although the possibility remains that it was indeed a craft, that was "glowing". it flew, not floated, but "flew" like some type of craft. i don't know what it was, but i've never seen anything like it, and i can't for the life of me explain it. my very first ufo.
content.summary: Small orange-pinkish light moved in a straight line from ne to sw....

content.detailedDescription:
Looking east from east tucson, we spotted 3 lights rising up from the horizon, all 3 taking diffrent paths. soon after the first three started to line up at about 30 degrees above horizon to 45 degrees. at that point they slowed down and almost stopped in line. then 2 more lights came in from the left of these bright red lights and started to circle around the first 3 lights. the first 3 lights then appeared to fly away due east away from us without appearing to rise or fall in height from the horizon. they looked like they were traveling @ maybe 300-400 miles per hour and faded out quikly. meanwhile the other two lights continued to rise and cross each other at @ 40-45 degrees up from horizon. one ligh faded out pretty fast, not flying away, just faded out. the last red light then moved faily slowly away to the east getting dimmer. after almost a minute it was getting hard to see, but then flashed very bright and then appeared to fly straight up and out of sight in less than 2 seconds. we are sure they were not any type of aircraft that we have ever seen before and preformed manuveres that cant be done by modern airplanes.
my wife and her son, and myself feel very strongly that these lights were of extra terrestrial nature.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 5+ lights moving in all diffrent directions far east of tucson then flashing away at fast speed!!

content.detailedDescription: While playing scrabble on our west-facing back porch, noticed a large bright orange light moving rather slowly from north-northwest towards the south-southeast. object made no sound. object appeared to turn right towards the southwest, out over the gulf of mexico. brightness of object did not change as the turn was made. brightness of the object diminished as it appeared to move away. object was witnessed for approximately 4 minutes. was witnessed by three others and all commented on the unusual nature of the incident. after thinking about the incident for an hour, i called and reported the incident to pinellas county sheriff in dunedin, fl. inquired if any other calls had been placed about the incident, and was informed that they had received no other calls.
content.summary: Very unusual light in the sky, and it is moving.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my side yard bringing in the bird feeders as we have a raiding raccoon and it destroys the feeders. i live 50 miles north west of o'hare airport ( chicago ) i like to watch the planes as they fly over both day and night, i noticed a jumbo jet on it's landing path and i like the view of their wing tip lights from rear or the amber glow they have. i noticed a bright star like object behind and above the plane, at first i thought it was jupiter but then i noticed that it was moving at the same speed as the plane. normal rule that i know of is 3 mile distance between planes landing. it stayed above and behind the plane until the plane was out of sight, but i could still see it on the horizon, the object that is. it had no strobe lights or any lights at all. a second plane was within the normal distance from the jumbo jet and flying at same altitude as jumbo jet and desending. my thoughts after was wow my second sighting in two months, sorry haven't reported the first one yet, but i guess i will.
i mentioned my sighting to my local meeting of mufon illionis today and since another also mentioned seeing a object like i discribed on same day and time i was asked to report, so here you go.
content.summary: Trailing a jumbo jet landing at o'hare airport chicago.

content.detailedDescription: Well here we go, i was at the auction in concord, nh as i usually am on a thursday night. i left the auction at about 8:15 heading back home to vermont going up i-89 when in the area while on the interstate around warner, nh exit 9 at about 8:30 i noticed in the sky flying low slow and bright a big object. i then slowed down while on the interstate and watched it as it approached and passed directly over head and went south as i went north. it was a partically moonlite night the object was below the cloud line aprox 2,000-3,000 feet up. judging by the width of the lights at that height if they were on the ground they would have stretched beyond the width of the interstate. no aircraft that i know of has a light set-up like this and i know my aircraft. there were no green or red lights blinking or visible on the ends where wing tips would be. it floated along at a speed a little bit faster than a hot air balloon. absolutely no airplane, jet aircraft, or helicopter, moving too slow and the form would have been visible. this is not the first time i have seen strange objects and lights in the sky in this area at night. at first i just thought it was an airplane but once it got closer and more visible i knew it was something more and the speed told me otherwise. it was very fasinating to watch.
content.summary: A row of 4 lights shining straight down just floating along like a hot air balloon

content.detailedDescription: I pulled into a shell gas station on the corner of parker and quincy in aurora, co.  i was filling up my car with gas when i saw a plane fly over from the north.  being an aviation enthusiast, i glanced up to look at the plane and noticed right behind it, 3 very faint white dots to the north.  the dot in the center glowed red for a few seconds, like a window reflector used to block heat on a car window.  at first i thought it was either 3 aircraft or balloons.  but the objects were completely stationary, not moving like an aircraft, just standing still in the sky.  after about a minute the sphere on the far left disappeared.  the two remaining spheres stayed stationary for about 10 seconds but then the one on the far right moved to the center sphere very quickly, and then disappeared.  i grabbed my camera and took a picture of the center sphere but it was an old manual film camera (pentax k1000) and the film did not turn out correctly exposed.  i could not tell how far away the objects were but my guess would have to be several miles.  the center sphere vanished about 20 seconds after i took a few pictures of it.  i've been very cautious about telling people since i was afraid of being labeled crazy.  i've only told my mom about the experience.
content.summary: Saw 3 sphere shaped objects while at a gas station to the north

content.detailedDescription:
Ok well it was mid november in 2007, and i was driving my motor scooter home from work, of which i got off at 6.  for a small aerial view, if you wish to look at a map to understand, i was going south on industrial blvd from arlington (76011) to euless (76039) and this event took place at the intersection of trinity blvd and industrial.  
    among my approach to the given intersection i noticed a darkish gray/silver looking balloon floating about in the wind as balloons do at about my 2 o clock and 100 feet or so in the air..Maybe 75 degree angle from the ground.  assuming it was a balloon, i looked away from the object and towards the oncoming intersection until i passed under a train bridge and looked back in that direction. it started wayy up there in the sky and was traveling closer towards me with awkward trajectory until it reached that 100ft height mark. at this point i still thought it was balloon, but the movements were so rapid, like it was either spinning really really fast and i could only see it at moments (like when you turn a fan on in the living room and stare up, you see the blades in still flashes rather than a big circular blur)  btw i apologize if i write funny..Just how its coming out.  egg shaped as it was at the time, it also looked as if it could have been shaking as dice would inside your hand before you roll them.  my eyes are fixated on the object when i reach the intersection at industrial and trinity, for i have a prolonged history in ufo attraction and am beginning to believe this specific event is out of the ordinary.  i stop as the 3rd vehicle back at the red light, and the object is now at my 9 oclock and almost right above me.  it is here that gets me.  the object switches on 2 separate rows of red lights on the bottom.  each light is rectangular in shape, and the rows are parallel to eachother and consist of 4 lights each.  no longer is this object looking as a well-rounded silver egg, but a triangle.  the corners on the triangle were still slightly rounded out as not to make points out of them.  the light is still red, and i am looking straight up with my jaw open as the object starts to move again.  this time without confusing movements.  it travels in the same direction of its flashing lights..Back to front and moving the same direction i would be moving once the intersection light switches green.  but before my light turns green, this object..Now maybe 20+ feet in diameter turns its trajectory around, and so i am free to see the full shape of the object, as light from the ground is barely reflecting off of its edges.  it looks dark, and quite frankly like a boomerang.  without the lights consistently moving on the bottom, i would definitely be saying that it was a boomerang shape.  it turns around as any real aircraft would.. by following the 'nose' of the craft.  or it was just slowly spinning like a top.  but my light turns green and this object is still flashing its lights, turning around and remaining completely silent.  i was on a vehicle which does not enclose me to sounds of the road, and i can definitely tell you there was zero sound coming from above me..Definitely not a helicopter and definitely not a plane.  at this point i am in complete awe and in full awareness of what i'm looking at.  i take off going straight, which is now the opposite direction of the moving craft, but the craft takes a sharp right as im looking back at it while moving with traffic.  it literally travels west almost directly above trinity blvd, moving shiftily up, and down..Up and down while still traveling down the road.  before i couldnt watch anymore because of traffic and an approaching highway area, it turns a spotlight on facing straight down.  mind you, this thing was easily a mile or so away now.  the spotlight was not exactly a laser looking spotlight like in independence day, but like a narrow cone and literally cut off at a specific point before it hit the ground.  maybe less than 2 seconds after turning the spotlight on, the spotlight turned off and the up and down bounce-like movements began again and it kept flying away.

what is really really weird to mee..Is i love ufos, aliens..To talk with another planets race would be absolutely awesome to me..But for some reason this event has really kinda freaked me out.  i think it might be because what i saw exhibited extraordinary technology of which i would not have guessed??  the egg shape with a light color bouncing in the wind, left and right and up and down very very fast like a gust of wind had full control of it.  to it changing shape, color and size.  i don't know..But now, when i see a balloon in the sky my literal first reaction is that of fright.  and along those same lines, when i am driving on the highway at night and there is a highway light out, the shape and color of that dead light fixture is so eerily similar to the initial view i had of my encounter that i also feel fear immediately upon making eye contact with it.  i guess that is why i have taken so long to speak up to you guys.  

but there you go, i hope you get back to me because i would probably feel a lot better if somebody has seen the same thing lol.  btw i hear china is about to be the first to publicly break news of communication with another species.  that could be years from now, but its apparently in the works.  pretty cool being they already publicly announced they have ufo technology.  yeah, hope you enjoyed, get back to be if possible!

i'm sorry i couldn't make this sketch photo big enough
*(wit's first name deleted--cms/sg).
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other,Unknown
content.summary: What i initially assumed was a balloon turned out  to be more of a shape shiftingish aircraft.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on my back porch with other members of my family observing a beautiful circumhorizontal arc to the south of our house when i decided to take a picture to e'mail it to friends. i took a few pictures, deleted the ones i didn't like, and downloaded the one i did to my computer days later. when i blew up the photo on my computer screen i notice what looked like a small ball in the sky to the upper left; i thought at first it was a glitch in my camera's pixels since my camera is old (sony dsc-p31, 2.0 mega pixel); but the object cast an undershadow, and also seamed to be reflecting sunlight. i guessed from what i saw on screen that if object was real it must have been about 300 ft. in the air, and about a 1 mile south. hope you enjoy looking over this photo (and the circumhorizontal arch), and my two zooms - the second was done by color heightening: interesting how the object takes on an orange color like in the arc.
content.summary: Unidentified object observed in upper left portion of photo of circumhorizontal arc after photo was downloaded and blown up on computer screen.

content.detailedDescription: I was in the car heded back to my house with my hsband. he pointed out a object in the sky and was kidding around and said it was a ufo. i told him he was crazy and looked at the sky to see what he was talking about. i then told him that it really did look like a ufo because it did not resemble a airplane or anything else i had ever seen before. i looked down beside me to get my phone and call and tell my mother and when i looked back up to see it again it was gone. me and my husband looked everywhere in the sky for it and we were unable to locate it. where we saw the ufo was only a few miles from our house when we got home we looked again and we were still unable to see where it was or to possible make out if it was a plane that we had mistaken for a ufo.
content.summary: Cigar shaped, shiny

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to avon to go to walmart and on us 36 i looked up over the lights of avon and there were three bright white lights no flashing red or blue or green just solid white moving to the right and i asked my wife if she seen them and she said yes two of them dissapeared behind the trees then the last one got brighter then vanished and thats the last i seen of them my wife thought it was three planes but i do not agree they were moving too slow as low as they were and too close together this experience was by far one of the creepiest ive seen
content.summary: Three different lights moving diff. speeds no flashing lights

content.detailedDescription:
Date of sighting: november 18, 2010
location of sighting: kennedy space center, florida

i was watching one of the nasa live cams and i noticed an object  fly near the top of the shuttle. i quickly took 12 screenshots, because this object was so obvious. what i saw is exactly what is in the photos here. i saw a gray metallic like football craft over the shuttle discovery.

the cam is not a video cam but a photo cam that is updated every 3-5 minutes. i waited for the next photo and between photo you could see quick motion video of the craft. it shot downward at an angle that was about 60-70 degrees shooting tot he bottom left of the screen. no at that moment i hesitated and could not believe i saw it move. it was a straight line, not a bent line and not curved in any way. 

it is my belief that this ufo was a probe, unmanned but remote controlled and was observing them working to fix the cracks in the shuttle tanks. was it there because it could see something bad happening in the future i wonder? the shuttle discovery was delayed from first week of november to now be launched on the 30th of november. 

i took only screenshots of cams that nasa has. this ufo was over the shuttle discover while repairs were being made. i cannot imagine how an alien craft could possibly get into a high security launch pad area without nasa security or radar towers becoming aware of it. unless of course, nasa did know about the probe, but did not see it as a threat, but perhaps an allowed alien craft that is sometimes seen at nasa? then again, this may be a nasa craft, knowing their endless budget and hi-tech gadgets.

please tell me in comments what you think about this and what it may be. thank you, *(wit's name and other information deleted--cms/sg).
content.summary: This is 2nd ufo i caught in 2 days on same nasa live cam.

content.detailedDescription:
Date of sighting: november 17, 2010 
location of sighting: kennedy space center, florida, usa

 
i was watching a live nasa cam and noticed three orb like white objects around the top area of the space shuttle launch pad. these objects did not seem to move in the video and i am uncertain if it was video or photos that updated every 10-30 seconds. either way, i saw no change in their positions. i watched, but the cam position changed so that all i saw was a close up view of the lower part of the shuttle. the orbs were no longer visible with this new viewing position.

i googled the shuttle info and found that the shuttles launch was delayed on nov 3 due to a fuel leak and cracks on the space shuttle discovery���s external tank. this is suppose to be the discovery���s last voyage, but am uncertain about this fact. launch was now set to 30th of november.

perhaps it is possible that the discovery was having periodic visits from ufos and this caused nasa to worry?? further investigation is needed.

*(wit's name and other information deleted--cms/sg) & i often san over live cams of the world as my hobby.
content.summary: I was watching a live nasa cam and noticed three orb like white objects around the top area of the space shuttle launch pad.

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling south bound on the garden state parkway (gsp) at approximately 3:30 pm on friday november 19, 2010, when i observed what appeared to be an extremely wide jet stream making a very slow vertical decent. my first observation was in the area of exit 145/ i-280 (east orange, nj). the jet stream was extremely wide, wider than any plane i've ever observed and it started out at the same width as it remained in the trail, unlike a plane where it starts thin and then widens.  i watched this and noticed many planes, about a half dozen jets flying around the area in addition to the typical newark airport traffic where i observed the usual passenger planes in the usual decent patterns. as i continued south bound on the gsp around exit 138 (roselle park, nj 07204) the object was directly observable in the windshield and traffic came to a sudden halt then picked up again in about 30-45 seconds after the roadway turned and the object was not observable.  i exited the gsp at exit 137 (cranford, nj 07016) and turned right onto north street (probably west bound) no longer able to observe the decent of whatever it was, i continued to observe abnormal numbers of jet planes, nearing a dozen, flying around the sky.  at this point i saw what appeared to be reflecting light from a metal object, the reflection would be from bear metal, i was unable to observe the shape as the reflection obscured direct view.  the reflecting light then moved horizontal at a slow pace and disappeared, i also observed a plane making a decent for newark airport at the same time in reasonably close proximity, the movements were nothing alike, they were clearly very different objects.  after the horizontal movement of the object it disappeared, then reappeared.  i then made a left turn onto centennial ave (cranford, nj 07016) losing sight, went one block, made a right onto south ave (cranford, nj 07016). on south ave i again observed the object reflecting light and still lots of planes in the sky.  at the cranford train station i made a left and lost site of the object, went about 3 blocks and made a right onto lincoln ave (cranford, nj 07016) where again i observed the object roughly when crossing walnut street. i lost sight of the object after making a left onto denman ave.  i thought i may have seen it again about 10 minutes later from my house, but it was through trees and the observation is questionable.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw an object making very slow vertical decent/ nose dive had a trail much wider than any plane in cylinder shape lots of planes flying around

content.detailedDescription: I was on the way back from a restaurant with my girlfriend and friends. i was looking out the left window of the rear passenger as i was sitting next to her. i noticed a strange orb of light move up into some "clouds" and i was shocked initially but decided to borrow my girlfriend's glasses to get a better look. i noticed another orb directly vertical to the orb i saw which didn't make any other appearance after i first saw it. the second orb remained there even after we passed by a semi truck. i've been questioning this same event ever since then till this day. i don't have any photographic proof of it. i would like to remain anonymous due to my concern for the safety of the people i care about.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Unknown
content.summary: I saw an orb as i was looking out the window of the rear passenger, it moved swiftly upwards into a cloud and i blanked out for a moment before raising a brow then borrowing my girlfriend's glasses.

content.detailedDescription: I was heading home from my son house in mullica hill when i saw a brightly lit ball in the eastern sky. i was heading east on harrison road and i made a right hand turn onto clems run road.  i then noticed the object out my drivers side window.  the sky was clear and i could see many planes flying about in the distance. the object was about the size of a dime held at arms length.  the object stayed stationary then suddenly decended and vanished.
content.summary: Brightly lit ball of light descended then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
I had read recently that huge ships from outer space are hovering over our world and that they want us to see them so we will get used to them and not be afraid of them before they land here, and they are going to land soon.  so, after reading the whole website "the new earth", which took me six months of part time reading, i did go outside my house one night and look at the sky just for the heck of it, which i normally don't do.  the only thing i saw to look at was directly in front of me to the northeast and looked like what i thought was a planet of some kind, or a star.  i am not at all educated on the planets, as i was never interested in astronomy.

it twinkled with red, white and blue lights that seemed to be revolving, but then as i watched it i saw it moving around, up and down, backward and forward.  that sure got my attention.  i just stayed and watched it, then went in and got my husband and he saw it too and we were both amazed.  then i called up my neighbors and my husband's nephew and they saw it and couldn't imagine what it was but didn't seem too interested in finding out.  i went inside but kept coming back out to look again.  it stayed there all evening, moving constantly, and i finally went in to bed at about 9 pm.  the next night it was there again in the same way.  this was two weeks ago.  now i am looking all over the sky every night at all hours and i see them everywhere when the sky is clear.  our night sky is literally crawling with these sparkling, moving, objects.  it is utterly fantastic to see.  during the course of a long night they travel closer to each other, away from each other, and they come into view over the trees at different places on different nights.  the one i first saw always came up behind one certain tree on my horizon, but last night it came up farther to the right or behind a different tree, not that close to the first one.  i can definitely see five of them in a circle around our town and valley every night, at probably the same distance away from earth.  they are identical in appearance.  but very late at night the stars seem to be much brighter and i can see more of the moving ufo's, dimmer and farther away in space.  two nights ago i went out at 3:30 am and saw a whole new bunch.  the one in the northeast was stationed quite close to the one that comes up in the east.  four bright moving objects were placed roughly in a square off to the right side of my house, in the sky.  none of these objects has ever come close to earth, that i can see.  they are in outer space but you can still see them with your bare eyes and my eyes are not that good.  i don't have a telescope but one neighbor does and she says she will get it down from a high shelf in her garage soon so we can take a better look.  i have looked at them with binoculars but i get pretty much the same view as without them.  no matter where they are in the sky, they never sit still.  i think it's because they want to attract our attention.  one day i called the local newspaper to tell them about it but they haven't returned my call.  anyone in this town could see them if they ever looked up and paid attention.  we are not too many miles from nellis afb but we are not in the nellis test range where they do their testing of whatever they test.  we are quite far to the west of nellis.  i want to get everyone to see these things.  even if we can't do anything about them we could at least have some kind of a dialogue going on.  whatever you think, i would like to hear it.  thank you.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Sparkling objects with red and blue revolving lights in outer space

content.detailedDescription:
The evening was at dust on a beautiful night so we had the windowns down.  traveling along mackay road in gso, nc my eyes caught sight of some lights in the overhead sky.  my minds eye thought it was a baseball field and upon realizing there were no fields in our area i screamed for my husband to pull the car into the center lane and stop.  as a car passed us the person screamed holy ****.  hovering 100 feet over our head perfectly formed in the background of the dusk of night was a trianle some 200 feet wide just sitting staring back at us.  we decided to make a mental note of the object, had no camera, and we just sat and watched it.  the 60 lights below were mostly the size of your first with three lights red, three green and three orange.  it didn't have any large lights only these small lights.  as the object starting moving west across the road we followed.  we were moving at 15 miles per hour.  as we turned the road to follow the object was no where in sight.  my husband and i though it was a stealth bomber and when we got home we looked them up and we also drew a picture of what we saw so our mings would no run rampant.  we called a local tv station to report and they said they had other sightings but unless it was spitting our flames they didn't care.  we called the fbi since it was the day before 9/11 and we contacted homeland security.  they didn't care.  we are both 62 and have never in our lives used drugs nor are we on any medication.  the stealth bomber has jagged edges this object was a perfect triangle and we saw it as clear as a bell.  we do wear reading glassed but thats all.  it did hover and it did move at 15 miles per hour and it did disappear.  my husband is a carpenter and that is how he knew the height above us and the width.

just in case you need to know.  thank
content.summary: Hovering over our car 100 feet was a charcoal triangle object charcoal color with some 60 lights on belly

content.detailedDescription:
A bright fast moving orb flies 15 feet from me, just above my backyard fence then vanishes. it was not visible with the naked eye, only with ir. as this single bright round orb moved near me, i could see it���s eye or center iris open up then close and  then reopen again when i paused the video on playback. this is not something you see everyday, even with an ir camera. 

i felt an intelligence radiate from it as it was looking at me sitting next to my 8 ufo cameras looking up, my 8 vcrs and monitors. this orb visit was a little close for comfort but i love the adventure and whatever risk i am taking. can this orb be something other than an alien remote camera, probe or eye? can it be from a spiritual dimension (maybe energy of a dead relative or pet saying hello to me). i do not have an answer, only the video footage. what does it mean to you?
content.summary: Caught orb looking at me with ir camera
